sys_script_include.name: CheckDuplicateTeam

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_65ebad0d47430690bd3cb616536d43f0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1189834_teampu_0.CheckDuplicateTeam</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>CheckDuplicateTeam</name><script><![CDATA[var CheckDuplicateTeam = Class.create();
CheckDuplicateTeam.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    checkDuplicate: function(team_name, location) {
        var teamRecord = new GlideRecord('x_1189834_teampu_0_team');
        teamRecord.addQuery('team_name', team_name);
        teamRecord.addQuery('location', location);
        teamRecord.query();
        if (teamRecord.next()) {
            return true; // Duplicate found
        }
        return false; // No duplicate
    },

    type: 'CheckDuplicateTeam'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-25 18:03:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>65ebad0d47430690bd3cb616536d43f0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CheckDuplicateTeam</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Community Soccer League" source="x_1189834_teampu_0">ddfd0ef7478d4650bd3cb616536d4350</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Community Soccer League">ddfd0ef7478d4650bd3cb616536d4350</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_65ebad0d47430690bd3cb616536d43f0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-25 18:05:43</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
